resources.string: Győződj meg róla, hogy van biztonsági mentésed erről a tárcáról.
Az AppCoins BDS Wallet engedélyt kér a kamera használatára, hogy QR-kódokat tudjon beolvasni.
Are you sure you want to remove this wallet?

Mivel a pénzedet kizárólagosan te kezeled, nagyon erősen ajánljuk, hogy készíts biztonsági mentést keystore-odról. \n\nErre azért van szükség, mert tárcádat sose mentjük felhőbe vagy az eszközöd hagyományos biztonsági mentéseibe, így az app törlése esetén elveszhet.
A folytatáshoz kérjük oldd fel Androidos eszközödet.
Bármilyen root jogokkal rendelkező app hozzáférhet az AppCoins Wallet keychain-adataihoz, így el is lophatja azokat! Azonnal töröld ezt a tárcát, majd állítsd vissza egy biztonságos eszközön.
Még nem adtál meg egyéni tokeneket.
A privát kulcsnak 64 karakterből kell állnia
How would you like to buy?
A QR-kód nem tartalmaz érvényes címet
Are you sure you want to close this µRaiden channel?
A privát kulcsok sose hagyják el eszközödet.
Minden alkalmazáson belüli fizetésedet és jutalmadat APPC-al végezheted.
Jutalmakat kaphat, ha kedvenc appjaiban és játékaiban vásárol.
Alkalmazáson belüli vásárlásaidat a kedvenc fizetési módszereddel hajthatod végre.
Privát kulcsaid sose hagyják el eszközödet, így AppCoin-jaid mindig biztonságban lesznek.
All your transactions are always safe thanks to the latest technology.
You\'ll earn free AppCoins Credits by trying apps and games.
Setting up your wallet for you…
A Kihagyás gombra bökve elfogadod az AppCoins Wallet %1$s és %2$s dokumentumait
Némi teszt-APPC segítségével megnézheted, hogy működnek az AppCoins-fizetések
Minél magasabb a benzinár, annál magasabb a tranzakciós díj is, de annál gyorsabban dolgozza fel az Ethereum-hálózat.

A benzinkorlát megakadályozza, hogy az okosszerződések felemésszék az összes Ethereum-odat. Megpróbáljuk automatikusan kiszámítani a benzinkorlátot, de egyes okosszerződésekhez neked kell megadni egyéni korlátot.
Nem sikerült betölteni a tokenek listáját

A Trust Wallet for Android projektből indultunk ki, annak mellékágaként indítottuk el az AppCoins tárcaprogram fejlesztését. A már leprogramozott funkciókat tekintve ezt találtuk a legjobb megoldásnak. Azzal a céllal fork-oltuk a programot, hogy a releváns új implementációkat és javításokat visszaadjuk az eredeti programnak.
Helytelen Ethereum hálózati vagy ismeretlen token
A blockchain hiba történt, kérjük, próbáld újra később.
Reward received!👌 You\’ll have to wait %1$sh%2$sm to earn more rewards by trying apps ⏰!
You reached your daily rewards limit. ⏰ Come back in %1$sh%2$sm and try again!
You don\'t have enough funds to get rewarded
Ez a jutalomkampány már lezárásra került
Ez a jutalomkampány nem érhető el országodban
Már kaptál jutalmat ebben a kampányban
Sajnáljuk, de hiba történt. próbáld újra!
You\'re using a dev version of the AppCoins Wallet. Please download the official release to process the reward.
The Bonus you received on %s has been reverted. Contact Support for more information.
The top-up you made on %s has been reverted. Contact Support for more information.
The purchase you made on %s has been reverted. Contact Support for more information.
AppCoins-ok fogadásához igazold, hogy ember vagy
Írd be a képen látható szavakat
You’ll not pay fees for the transactions made with this developer until the amount you choose is reached. The amount will be withdrawn and stored, and you can close this channel anytime.
You don\'t have enough funds on your µRainden payment channel. Go to your wallet and close the channel to create a new one. Do you still want to complete this purchase with a standard payment?
Akár %s%% bónuszt kaphatsz kedvenc appjaiban és játékaiban!
APPC-krediteket kapsz, ha vásárolsz kedvenc appjaiban és játékaidban.
APPC-krediteket kapsz, ha vásárolsz kedvenc appjaiban és játékaidban.
The more you spend in your favorite apps, the bigger the Bonus!
Vigyázz, ne menj neki egy bolygónak!
You can use this bonus in your next purchase.
Amount spent to reach this level
Spend %1$s AppCoins more to reach level %2$s.
Your level is based on your purchase activity over the last 12 months.
You\'ll now get a %s bonus on every purchase. Keep buying to earn even more!
Congrats, you\'ll now get a %s bonus on every purchase!
Congrats! You\'ve reached the highest level 💃
Engedélyezd az AppCoins Wallet-nek, hogy tárcacímedet megadja a(z) %s számára.
Allow %1$s to provide your wallet address to %2$s.
Szükséged van egy tárcacímre! Az alábbi lépéseket követve hozz létre egyet az AppCoins Wallet-ben.
Még nem adtad meg az engedélyt az AppCoins Wallet-nek, hogy más appoknak biztosítsa tárcád címét.
were deposited in your account... Along with a bonus!
You can use this bonus in your next purchase.
Az Ethereum kriptovalután alapulnak az AppCoins-ok. Mivel nagyon népszerű, a legtöbb váltónál adható és vehető!
Az AppCoins az alkalmazások gazdaságának kriptovalutája. Bizonyos váltóknál adható-vehető, fizetésre pedig alkalmazásokon belüli vásárlásoknál használható.
Alkalmazásokon belüli vásárlások tokenje! Töltsd fel tárcádat APPC-kredittel, vagy szerezd meg őket appok használatával. Ezek mellett barátok is küldhetik egymásnak!
Oops, something went wrong. Please try again!
Share the link so you can get the funds sent to you!
Hey there! Please, send me %1$s AppCoins Credits to buy an item on %2$s. Link: %3$s
Olvasd be vagy írd be barátod tárcacímét.
It seems your\'re not connected to the Internet. Check your connection and try again!
I agree to AppCoins Wallet\'s %1$s and %2$s.
Please accept our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy to continue
The best Android apps are waiting for you.
Once you complete the payment you\'ll receive the AppCoins Credits in your wallet. Then go back to the game to make the purchase!
For security reasons, we need to verify your wallet with a SMS code.
Verify your wallet to get rewards! We\'ll send you a verification code.
This is only for security reasons, we don\'t store any personal data.
Your verification code is %s. Use it to verify your AppCoins Wallet address.
You can now earn AppCoins Credits by inviting friends or installing apps.

Oops, something went wrong. Try again!
You need to be connected to the internet
Oops, your time expired. Start again!
It seems you reached the attempts limit. Please wait to try again.

You\'ll use a small amount of ETH to pay for the fees.
You don\'t have enough AppCoins or Ether for this purchase.
You don\'t have enough ETH to pay for the gas.
You don\'t have enough AppCoins to complete this purchase.
You don\'t have enough AppCoins Credits, try topping up!
You earned enough AppCoins Credits for this purchase. Enjoy!
Try an app for 2 minutes and earn AppCoins Credits!
Try an app for 2 minutes and get a reward in AppCoins Credits to make your purchase!
Your AppCoins Credits balance is blocked

Due to an unusual transaction history, your AppCoins Credits balance was blocked. You\'ll still be able to make payments and transaction with other methods except AppCoins Credits.\n\nIf you believe this is a mistake, contact us at:
There was a problem with your card. Please try again or contact us.
The transaction has been rejected by your bank. Please try with a different card or contact us.
It seems you don\'t have enough funds or there\'s a limit on your card. Please try with a different one.
It seems your card has expired. Please try with a different one.
Are you sure your card number is correct? Please check and try again.
Your card type is not supported yet. Try with a different one.
Are you sure the security information is correct? Please try again.
Your CVV/CVC code seems to be wrong. Please try again.
Oops, something is not ok with your wallet. Please contact us.
It seems your phone number is not compatible with this payment method.
Your carrier doesn\'t support payments for less than %s.
Your carrier doesn\'t support payments for more than %s.
Oops, we\'re having issues with this purchase. Please contact us.
It seems something isn\'t ok with your wallet. Please contact us.
If the problem persists please contact us.
Try to complete the purchese after verifying your wallet.
Complete your payment with %s. You\'ll be notified once you receive the AppCoins Credits in your wallet.
Go back to the game and make the purchase using AppCoins Credits as a payment method.
Use these AppCoins Credits to make purchases in your favorite games!
Once you receive the AppCoins Credits, go back to the game and make the purchase using AppCoins Credits as a payment method.
Once you receive the AppCoins Credits, use them to make purchases in your favorite games!
Go back to %s to make the purchase using AppCoins Credits.
You and your friends can earn up to %s with our Referral Program!
You and your friends can earn AppCoins Credits with our Referral Program!
You need to verify your wallet to participate in the Referral Program. We\'ll sent you a verification code via SMS.
You\'ll get %1$s worth of AppCoins Credits on your first in-app purchase. Your first purchase must be above %2$s with any payment method other than AppCoins Credits.
It seems this number wasn\’t invited…
But you can still earn up to %s by inviting friends! 💃
Make your first in-app purchase to get your bonus.
Receive %s worth of AppCoins Credits for each friend. Just share the link!
Receive %s worth of AppCoins Credits for each friend. Your first need to verify your wallet.
Verify your wallet with a phone number
Make one in-app purchase or top-up above %s with any payment method other than AppCoins Credits
You\'ll earn %1$s worth in AppCoins Credits for each friend meeting both requirements (up to %2$s)
Discover how to earn free AppCoins Credits with our promotions and campaigns!
Earn up to %s by inviting friends
Share your invite link and earn AppCoins Credits.
Up to 30% bonus on every purchase
Up to %s%% bonus on every purchase
There are no available promotions at the moment. Come back later!
There are no apps with rewards available at the moment. Come back later!
Please update the AppCoins Wallet to receive this reward.
Update the AppCoins Wallet to complete this purchase.
It seems you\'re using an old version of the AppCoins Wallet. Please update it to guarantee the best experience and security.
Keeping the AppCoins Wallet updated guarantees the best experience.
Have you ever lost your phone? Backup your wallet now!
We don\'t store your private keys or any other access method. It\'s important to keep your wallet\'s backup (keystore) safe.
Keep your backup safe! Where do you want to save it?
Are you sure your backup file is on a safe place?
Your backup file is in your Downloads folder.
Choose a name for your backup file.
Print it and store it somewhere safe.
Save it on a USB drive.
Copy it to a private and secure cloud storage.
Make a backup of your wallet!
Make a backup of your wallet!
Keep your funds safe and make sure you can always access your wallet.
We strongly recommend to backup a wallet before removing it. You\'ll not be able to access it again unless you\'ve got a backup.
Are you sure you want to remove this wallet?
Olvasd be vagy írd be barátod tárcacímét.

Subscribe to services in your favorite apps and games and we\'ll deal with periodic payments.
The value in AppCoins may vary for next payment due to exchange rate.

You won\'t be charged anymore for this subscription, and you can use it until %s.
You\'ll receive this bonus on each payment.
Amount spent to reach this level
Spend %s AppCoins to reach next level
Spend %s AppCoins more to reach the next level.
\"The Earth is what we all have in common\" – Wendell Berry
\"That\'s one small step for a man, one giant leap for mankind\" – Neil Armstrong
\"I would like to die on Mars. Just not on impact.\" – Elon Musk
\"Everyone is a moon, and has a dark side which he never shows to anybody.\" – Mark Twain
\"All truths are easy to understand once they are discovered; the point is to discover them...\" – Galileo Galilei
\"If you find life on Europa, what would you call it? Would it be, like, Europeans?\" – Neil DeGrasse Tyson
\"The scientific theory I like best is that the rings of Saturn are composed entirely of lost airline luggage.\" – Mark Russell
\"I\'m sure the universe is full of intelligent life. It\'s just been too intelligent to come here.\" – Arthur C.Clarke
\"The moons of Uranus seem to have got a twist.\" – Sir Robert Stawell Ball
\"That star is not on the chart!\" – Heinrich d\'Arrest upon discovering Neptune.
\"Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known\" – Carl Sagan
